total_revenue.context: Q1 2021 net sales increased to $108.5 billion, up 44% year-over-year. Excluding the $2.1 billion favorable impact from foreign exchange rates, net sales grew by 41% compared to Q1 2020.
total_revenue.fx_impact: Foreign exchange rates had a favorable impact of $2.1 billion on net sales growth.

net_sales.context: North America net sales increased to $64.366 billion, up 40% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Operating expenses for North America increased to $60.916 billion, up 55% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Operating income for North America increased to $3.450 billion in Q1 2021, compared with $1.312 billion in Q1 2020.

net_sales.context: International net sales increased to $30.649 billion, up 60% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Operating expenses for International increased to $29.397 billion, up 28% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Operating income for International increased to $1.252 billion in Q1 2021, compared with a loss of $398 million in Q1 2020.

net_sales.context: AWS net sales increased to $13.503 billion, up 32% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Operating expenses for AWS increased to $9.340 billion, up 35% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Operating income for AWS increased to $4.163 billion in Q1 2021, compared with $2.596 billion in Q1 2020.

net_sales.context: Consolidated net sales increased to $108.518 billion, up 44% year-over-year.

operating_expenses.context: Consolidated operating expenses increased to $99.653 billion, up 31% year-over-year.

operating_income.context: Consolidated operating income increased to $8.865 billion in Q1 2021, compared with $3.989 billion in Q1 2020.

total_expenses.context: Consolidated operating expenses for Q1 2021 were $99.653 billion, up 31% from $71.463 billion in Q1 2020.
key_factors: Expanded marketing and general administrative expenses

COGS.context: Cost of goods sold increased to $91 million in Q1 2021.

Fulfillment.context: Fulfillment expenses increased to $342 million in Q1 2021.

Technology_and_content.context: Technology and content expenses increased to $1.228 billion in Q1 2021.

Marketing.context: Marketing expenses increased to $456 million in Q1 2021.

General_and_administrative.context: General and administrative expenses increased to $190 million in Q1 2021.

Other.context: WW shipping costs increased to $17.162 billion in Q1 2021.

Stock_based_Compensation.context: Total stock-based compensation expense increased to $2.306 billion in Q1 2021.

operating_income.context: Consolidated operating income increased to $8.865 billion in Q1 2021, compared with $3.989 billion in Q1 2020.

net_income.context: Net income increased to $8.1 billion in Q1 2021, compared with $2.535 billion in Q1 2020.

eps.context: Net income of $8.1 billion translates to $15.79 per diluted share in Q1 2021, compared with $5.01 per diluted share in Q1 2020.

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow increased to $26.4 billion for the trailing twelve months, up from $24.3 billion the previous year.

operating_cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow increased 69% to $67.2 billion for the trailing twelve months.

free_cash_flow_less_principal_repayments.context: Free cash flow less principal repayments of finance leases and financing obligations increased to $14.9 billion for the trailing twelve months, compared with $14.3 billion the previous year.

free_cash_flow_less_equipment_and_other_.context: Free cash flow less equipment finance leases and principal repayments of all other finance leases and financing obligations increased to $16.8 billion for the trailing twelve months, compared with $11.7 billion the previous year.

capital_expenditures.context: Invested over $10 billion in Project Kuiper, a low earth orbit satellite constellation initiative.

share_repurchase.context: Share repurchase details not provided in the provided information.

daily_active_users.context: No specific user metrics provided in the provided information.

monthly_active_users.context: No specific user metrics provided in the provided information.

total_employees.context: Employees (full-time and part-time; excludes contractors & temporary personnel) increased to 1,271,000 in Q1 2021, up 51% year-over-year.

market_position.description: Amazon continues to lead in various sectors including e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and innovative technologies.
initiatives: Expansion of AWS regions and services
Launch of Amazon Pharmacy and Amazon Fresh grocery stores
Introduction of Made For You in Amazon Fashion
Integration of Just Walk Out technology in Hudson stores
Enhancement of Prime Video's content and live sports offerings
Expansion of Amazon.pl in Poland
Opening of international physical retail stores powered by Just Walk Out technology

Expand technological innovations in AI, automation, and autonomous delivery systems
Enhance customer satisfaction and service offerings

Drive innovation in health and wellness through Amazon Pharmacy and Halo

Launch of Amazon One as a payment option at Whole Foods Market

factors: Increased demand for online shopping and AWS services
Expansion of Prime Video and other subscription services
Growth in AWS infrastructure and service offerings
Launch of new services like Amazon Pharmacy and Amazon Fresh
Prime Day expected to drive significant sales growth

leadership_transition.description: Jeff Bezos, Amazon founder and CEO, will transition to the role of Executive Chair in Q3 2021, and Andy Jassy will become Chief Executive Officer at that time.
leadership_transition.context: Jeff Bezos is stepping down to focus on long-term strategic initiatives and innovation, while Andy Jassy, head of AWS, will take over as CEO to lead Amazon's continued growth.
